sources.title: The Mummy's Tomb ( 1942)
sources.description: The ancient Egypt Mummy, Kharis, is transported from his homeland with the high priest Mehemet to wreak vengeance on the family who has defiled the sacred tomb of his beloved Princess Ananka.

metadata.Plot: A high priest travels to America with a living mummy to kill those who had desecrated the tomb of an Egyptian princess thirty years earlier.
metadata.Writer: Griffin Jay, Henry Sucher, Neil P. Varnick
metadata.Actors: Lon Chaney Jr., Dick Foran, John Hubbard
